structure.unit: Labels, Trade Marks, Names And Registration Thereof

law.catch_line: Use Of Registered Cans Without Consent Of Owner
law.text: No person shall without the consent of the owner take, detain, use, buy, sell, traffic in or otherwise dispose of any registered can, tub or cabinet. Possession of any such registered can, tub or cabinet by a person in the transaction of his business shall be prima facie evidence of violation of this section.
